We Can Save Your Money

Overview

This product can benifit to the various walks of life, including industry, bank, healthcare, military, etc.

Finance

Our product processes data within millisecond.Fraud prevention, risk control, credit rating and algorithmic transaction can be achieved with speed and quality.

Government

In terms of improving public service, we provide high performance action-oriented analytics. We can help in the fields of national security, fraud detection, intelligence, and other government-related sectors.

Telecoms

Zilliz empowers users to gain deep knowledge of network optimization, capacity monitoring, customer relationships, and data monetization

Healthcare

Encountering massive data from healthcare, our GPU database can assists medicine discovery and development, patient monitoring, and accurate diagnosis.

Retail

We provide real-time analytics and insights to retail vendors based on customer behaviors. Our solution fits to price and promotion optimization, product assortment, demand forecasting, and supply chain operations.
